headline: Ceva Animal Health hits $10 billion valuation, eyes IPO
summary: PARIS -France's Ceva Animal Health has raised 5.5 billion euros in equity, boosting its valuation to 9.2 billion euros, as shareholders including the billionaire Bettencourt-Meyers family increased...
